alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 1:47PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Newton and south central Jasper Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Seneca, or 10 miles southeast of Baxter Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Joplin... Carthage... Seneca... Granby... Duquesne... Duenweg... Diamond... Loma Linda... Leawood... Silver Creek... Shoal Creek Drive... Saginaw... Fidelity... Redings Mill... Grand Falls Plaza... Shoal Creek Estates... Dennis Acres... Cliff Village... Atlas... Racine... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 22. Interstate 49 between mile markers 25 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
